Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Our results have shown that all adenosine receptor agonists ( A1 and A2 ) reduce cocaine - and amphetamine - induced locomotor activity and indicate that cocaine - induced hyperactivity is more influenced by adenosine receptor agonists ( particularly A1 receptors ) than amphetamine - induced hyperactivity .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Adenosine receptor agonists (A1 and A2) |
| Cocaine-induced hyperactivity |
| Amphetamine-induced hyperactivity |

Note: These are the exact words used in the paragraph to refer to these entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Cocaine-induced hyperactivity |
| Amphetamine-induced hyperactivity |

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to a "Disease".
